import React from 'react'; import './AITestingTools.css'; const aiTestingTools = [ { name: 'Testim', description: 'AI驱动的端到端测试自动化平台。', link: 'https://www.testim.io/', image: 'https://www.testim.io/wp-content/themes/testim-2018/images/testim-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Functionize', description: '使用AI和ML进行智能测试自动化。', link: 'https://www.functionize.com/', image: 'https://www.functionize.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/functionize-logo-1.svg' }, { name: 'Applitools', description: '基于AI的视觉测试和监控平台。', link: 'https://applitools.com/', image: 'https://applitools.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Applitools_Logo_Blue.svg' }, { name: 'Mabl', description: '智能测试自动化平台。', link: 'https://www.mabl.com/', image: 'https://www.mabl.com/hubfs/mabl-logo-full-blue-2022.svg' }, { name: 'Eggplant', description: '智能自动化测试和监控解决方案。', link: 'https://www.eggplantsoftware.com/', image: 'https://www.eggplantsoftware.com/hubfs/Eggplant-2020/images/logos/eggplant-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Sauce Labs', description: '云端持续测试平台，支持AI驱动的测试。', link: 'https://saucelabs.com/', image: 'https://saucelabs.com/images/logo.png' }, { name: 'Perfecto', description: '智能测试自动化平台，支持Web和移动应用。', link: 'https://www.perfecto.io/', image: 'https://www.perfecto.io/sites/default/files/perfecto-logo.svg' }, { name: 'TestCraft', description: '基于AI的无代码测试自动化平台。', link: 'https://www.testcraft.io/', image: 'https://www.testcraft.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/testcraft-logo.png' }, { name: 'Testim.io', description: 'AI驱动的测试自动化工具。', link: 'https://www.testim.io/', image: 'https://www.testim.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/testim-logo.svg' }, { name: 'ReTest', description: '使用AI进行差异测试的工具。', link: 'https://retest.de/en/', image: 'https://retest.de/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/retest_logo.png' }, { name: 'Mesmer', description: 'AI驱动的移动应用测试自动化平台。', link: 'https://www.mesmerhq.com/', image: 'https://www.mesmerhq.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/mesmer-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Testleft', description: 'AI增强的测试自动化工具，集成于开发环境。', link: 'https://smartbear.com/product/testleft/', image: 'https://smartbear.com/SmartBear/media/images/Products/testleft-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Appsurify', description: '使用AI优化测试套件的工具。', link: 'https://www.appsurify.com/', image: 'https://www.appsurify.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/appsurify-logo.png' }, { name: 'Parasoft', description: '提供AI驱动的测试自动化解决方案。', link: 'https://www.parasoft.com/', image: 'https://www.parasoft.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/parasoft_logo.svg' }, { name: 'Diffblue', description: '使用AI自动生成Java单元测试。', link: 'https://www.diffblue.com/', image: 'https://www.diffblue.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/diffblue-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Kobiton', description: 'AI驱动的移动应用测试平台。', link: 'https://www.kobiton.com/', image: 'https://www.kobiton.com/wp-content/themes/kobiton/assets/images/logo.svg' }, { name: 'Testbirds', description: '众包和AI驱动的软件测试平台。', link: 'https://www.testbirds.com/', image: 'https://www.testbirds.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/testbirds-logo.svg' }, { name: 'Autify', description: 'AI驱动的无代码Web应用测试自动化平台。', link: 'https://autify.com/', image: 'https://autify.com/static/images/logo.svg' }, ]; function AITestingTools() { return (

AI 测试工具合集

{aiTestingTools.map((tool, index) => (

{tool.name}

{tool.description}

 ))}
); } export default AITestingTools;
